title: vanna mayil vElavan
sahitya:
vanna mayil vElavan tannaiyE nambi nAn innalaTru vAzhum inbam uTriDuvEn


anupallavi

  tannaiyE nambi varum anbar anaivaraiyum annai pOl aNaittut-tunbam tuDaittiDum


caraNam    cennaiyil irukkum semmAl aruganAna cenni malai sirakkum sEvark-koDiyOnAna
ten pazhani tigazhum daNDAyudanAna kunrakkuDi manra koDai vaLLalumAna
